description: This source file implements the Monitor plugin class for managing plugin restart limits, statistics, and actions via JSON-RPC API endpoints. It registers methods and properties for external calls and handles core monitor operations such as restart limits, resetting stats, and retrieving monitor status.

classes.name: Monitor
classes.description: Implements the monitor plugin providing restart limits, status, and reset functionalities with JSON-RPC interface.

methods.name: void RegisterAll()
methods.description: Registers API methods and properties for the plugin.

methods.name: void UnregisterAll()
methods.description: Unregisters all API methods and properties.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_restartlimits(const RestartlimitsParamsData & params)
methods.description: Sets new restart limits for a specified plugin.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData & params,InfoInfo & response)
methods.description: Resets statistics for a specified plugin and updates response with current info.

methods.name: uint32_t get_status(const string & index,Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo> & response) const
methods.description: Retrieves current memory and process statistics for a plugin or all plugins.

methods.name: void event_action(const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)
methods.description: Triggers an action event for a plugin, signaling an external event.
